page.title: 14AMBULANCE REPORT
page.content: 1. HOW MANY EMERGENCY CALLS DO YOU RECEIVE EVERY DAY:{ABOUT 4 2. HOW MAMY DO YOU SAVE OUT OF THOSE: { ALL OF THEM 3. HOW MANY AMBULANCES HAVE YOU IN BIDEFORD:{SIX 4. WHICH IS THE FURTHEST DISTANCE YOU { }TRAVEL:{365 SQUARE MILES 5. WHEN YOU HAVE AN EMERGENCY, HOW MANY MEN GO IN THE AMBULANCE:{TWO 6. ROUGHLY HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE YOU TO GET TO YOUR DESTINATION: {IT TAKES 1 MINUTE PER MILE. WE ARE {ALWAYS IN TIME TO HELP. 7. WHAT QUALIFICATIONS DO YOU NEED TO BE AN AMBULANCE MAN:{NONE REALLY, { YOU HAVE TO BE BETWEEN 21-35 YEARS { OLD, NEED COMMON SENSE AND A CLEAN { DRIVING LICENCE 8. WHAT IS THE AVERAGE ON HOW LONG AN AMBULANCE MAN WORKS HERE: { { EIGHT YEARS
